claim: Nanotechnology is on a molecular scale.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A nomenclature distinction has been suggested so that molecular materials for electronics refers to this latter field of bulk applications , while molecular scale electronics refers to the nanoscale single-molecule applications treated here .

claim: Nanotechnology is on a molecular scale.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nanotechnology  (  sometimes shortened to nanotech or nano  )  is the study of manipulating matter on an atomic and molecular scale .

claim: Nanotechnology is on a molecular scale.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Molecular scale electronics , also called single-molecule electronics , is a branch of nanotechnology that uses single molecules , or nanoscale collections of single molecules , as electronic components .

claim: Nanotechnology is on a molecular scale.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Potential applications in molecular scale electronics and nanomedicine are also being investigated .

claim: Nanotechnology is on a molecular scale.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nanotechnology  (  `` nanotech ''  )  is manipulation of matter on an atomic , molecular , and supramolecular scale .
